API_KEY.description: An API key that can be obtained from the data provider's dashboard

WS_SOCKET_KEY.description: A WEBSOCKET key that can be obtained from the data provider's dashboard

STOCK_WS_API_ENDPOINT.description: The Websocket endpoint to connect to for stock data

FOREX_WS_API_ENDPOINT.description: The Websocket endpoint to connect to for forex data

CRYPTO_WS_API_ENDPOINT.description: The Websocket endpoint to connect to for crypto data

ETF_WS_API_ENDPOINT.description: The Websocket endpoint to connect to for etf data
